text:
e="preserve">Ali Kirunda Kivejinja (12 June 1935 – 19 December 2020), more commonly known as Kirunda Kivejinja, was an Ugandan politician. He was the senior presidential advisor to the President of Uganda, Yoweri Museveni. He was the Second Deputy Prime Minister and Minister of East African Community Affairs from 2016 until his death.
Kivejinja died of COVID-19 on 19 December 2020 in Kampala, Uganda at the age of 85.

annotations.surface_form: Minister of East African Community Affairs
